name: Silence of the Dead
description:
Silence of the Dead is a horror game in the style of VHS and PS1. You went to your old farm house to finish something.

In this game you need to solve puzzles and survive a creature who is hiding in the cornfield.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Run: Shift

Jump: Space

Interact: Left Mouse Button

Inventory open/close: E

Drop: Q

Up/down in menu: Arrow up/down

Accept: Enter

Fullscreen on/off: F
